page.title: 09THE GAMEKEEPER CONTINUED
page.content: Equipment for Fox hunts-Guns, cartridges,game-bag,terriers. (Border Cairns and Jack Russell) Equipment for Hare hunts-Gun, cartridges,game-bags. (No dogs) Horses-Inchrory is one of the few Estates to retain Garron Ponies.These ponies are sure-footed,patient and will not move if a dead stag is put on its back. Motor vehicles-Land Rover,Champ,Jeep Snowtrac and Truck. The Gamekeeper's Dress-plus-fours, jacket, waistcoat, shirt, tie, socks, shoes. The gamekeeper's work-grouse beating, deer stalking, hare hunting, fox hunting, feeding deer, heather burning, repairing butts and roads. Wild life-roe deer, red deer, wildcats, foxes, stoats, weasels, rabbits, hares, grouse, pheasant,
